title: "MongoDB Stock Up 11,800% Since IPO. Generative AI Could Send It Higher"
excerpt: "MongoDB has grown considerably since going public in October 2017. As of July 2023, it had 4,527 employees, $1.3 billion in revenue, and 43,100 customers. Between its IPO and July 14, its stock price has increased from $30 a share at a 56% average annual rate to $400."
